name: places/ChIJO4ZGi5VZwokRFG1LdYuFUpg
adrFormatAddress: 125 2nd Ave #13, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Michael was very helpful during the college process. He individually researched the specific colleges that I wanted to apply to and he walked me through sample exemplar essays so I knew how to go about answering the questions colleges asked for. He put me on a schedule that made sure I was completing enough work each day in time to have all of my materials prepared well before the deadlines. During my junior year, he gave me incomparable, immensely helpful test prep and advice. Not only did I get a much higher SAT score, but working with him also encouraged me to diversify my reading and expand my vocabulary tenfold. Michael is extremely smart and kind, understanding, and supportive of my dreams. I feel genuinely so grateful to have chosen him and to be a recipient of his help. With his support, I ended up getting into my #1 college choice.

originalText.text: Michael is a great tutor. I worked with him on my college applications for about 3 months and his help made a huge difference in regards to the quality of my essays. Not only was his guidance beneficial to me in the college process, but also for my writing in general, whether it is analytical  essays for school or personal creative writing. Michael is an amazing writer! When I was stuck, or didn't know what to write, he always had ideas to cure the writer's block. His process is also very structured which helped me plan out what I wanted to get done in a session so we could be as efficient as possible. Thanks again Michael!

originalText.text: I reached out to Michael a few months back for help with my MBA application essays. Needless to say, Michael was very attentive to my individual needs, and I found him to be extremely experienced in the field of creative writing. He is one of the best tutors I've ever worked with, and I highly recommend him!

originalText.text: I have known Michael for 4 years. Michael is a wonderful and experienced teacher and mentor. He helped me with the TOEFL test ( for Ph.D. degree application), periodic essay strategizing, proofreading, vocabulary, speaking, etc. Classes with Michael are always efficient. Through Michael's tutoring, my English writing and speaking improved a lot.

originalText.text: Michael is the best college application counselor you could find. He helped my son for college application in Fall 2020. Without his help, my son could not have got a scholarship from a top school. His work is error free. My son learned a lot from Michael. I believe he is the best counselor I could have found. I am so grateful for his help
